newsitem.title: UK: Tambang Timah at $17.2000 in London.
newsitem.headline: Tambang Timah at $17.2000 in London.

text.p: PT Tambang Timah closed at $17.2000 per GDR in London on Thursday. It recorded the day's low of $17.2000 and the day's high of $17.375.
One Global Depository Receipt represents 10 common shares.
